---------------------------------------------
R4 TEST 


Rs2 shift value : 4 bits




00001 RS1
R1 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R1 with 0000111100001111 at index  0 - 000
LI R1 with 0000111100001111 at index  1 - 001
LI R1 with 0000111100001111 at index  2 - 010
LI R1 with 0000111100001111 at index  3 - 011
LI R1 with 0000111100001111 at index  4 - 100
LI R1 with 0000111100001111 at index  5 - 101
LI R1 with 0000111100001111 at index  6 - 110
LI R1 with 0000111100001111 at index  7 - 111




 
00000
R0 gets result.

Opcode
1100000001001000000100000

program: 

0000000011110000111100001  
0001000011110000111100001 
0010000011110000111100001  
0011000011110000111100001  
0100000011110000111100001  
0101000011110000111100001  
0110000011110000111100001  
0111000011110000111100001  
1100000001001000000100000



passes.

---------------------------------------------------
